## **Contact us**

We value your feedback and are here to help you with any questions, support needs or collaboration requests. Please use the following means to get in touch with us:

####  **GitHub**

For issues, feature requests, questions, or general feedback, please use the Issues tab on our GitHub repository:

- <a href="https://github.com/iMARES-group/glossa/issues" target="_blank">GLOSSA GitHub</a>

### **Contact form**

For special support or collaboration requests, please contact us via the contact form at the end of the iMARES website:

- <a href="https://imares.science/" target="_blank">iMARES</a>

### **Outreach channels**

Follow our research group on *Bluesky* and *X* (*Twitter*) for the latest news and updates:

- Bluesky: <a href="https://bsky.app/profile/imares-group.bsky.social" target="_blank">\@iMARES_group</a>

- X (Twitter): <a href="https://x.com/iMARES_group" target="_blank">\@iMARES_group</a>

Thank you for your support! If you want to know more about the group go and visit our website: <a href="https://imares.science/" target="_blank">iMARES</a>.
